revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Atlas]]
[[Category:Dungeons]]
[[File:CovetousDungeonEntranceImage.png|625px|right|]]
== Notes ==
*Located south of [[Minoc]], west of [[Vesper]], and northwest of [[Cove]].
*Receives the 50% Dungeon Skill Gain Bonus.

==Champion Spawn==
Beware adventurers, deep within this covetous cove, the [[Champion Spawns#Corpse Devourer - Random champion skull|Corpse Devourer]] awaits his dinner on the 5th level! [[Champion Spawns#Corpse Devourer - Random champion skull|Corpse Devourer]] is one of the many [[Champion Spawns|Champions]] that inhabit the lands of Sosaria. 

==Dungeon Boss==
You may also encounter [[Dungeon_Bosses#Akor|Akor]] by the alter atop the citadel on the 5th level! [[Dungeon_Bosses#Akor|Akor]] is one of the many [[Dungeon_Bosses|Dungeon Bosses]] that can be found in Sosaria.

== [[Paragons]] ==
*Gazer - Level 1
*Lich - Level 3
*Lich Lord - Level 3, Level 5
*Drake - Level 4b
*Dragon - Level 4b
*Shadow Wyrm - Level 4b
*Poison Elemental - Level 5
== [[Lockpicking|Locked Chests]] ==
*3x Low Tier (crates, barrels, kegs) - Level 1(x3)
